# dateValue

**Instance Property**

The date selected by the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var dateValue: Date { get set }
```

## Discussion

When selecting a date range, this property represents the time interval’s starting date.

## Accessing Object Values

- **timeInterval**: The time interval selected by the date picker.
